original_text: Rich people must not give more than six grams of silver. Poor people must not give less than that. That is the offering that you must each give to the Lord. It is the price that everyone must pay for his life.
korean_text: 너희의 생명을 대속하기 위하여 여호와께 드릴 때에 부자라고 반 세겔에서 더 내지 말고 가난한 자라고 덜 내지 말지며

sentences.original_text: Rich people must not give more than six grams of silver.
sentences.korean_translation: 부자 사람들은 은 6그램보다 더 많이 드려서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: Poor people must not give less than that.
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 사람들은 그것보다 적게 드려서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: that you must each give to the Lord.
that everyone must pay for his life.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람이 자기의 생명을 위해 지불해야 하는.
